nodes.text: Garrow's Neck was a fortress on the continent of Alanciar on the planet Kesh. It was just inland from Point Defiance, one of the westernmost points of the landmass that overlooked the Western Sea, in the direction of the continent of Keshtah. The Alanciari, the Keshiri natives of Alanciar, maintained a garrison of soldiers at Garrow's Neck to respond in the event of an invasion by the Lost Tribe of Sith, who lived on Keshtah.
